question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. lamp
B. can of soft drink
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The lamp is positioned on the desk near the back wall, while the can of soft drink is on the desk closer to the foreground, making the lamp clearly further away in 3D space.
